price: 39. Kasi apesaki mokongo mpe alikiaki sé na makasi naye, mpe alobaki ete: Oyo azali nganga to azali ligboma.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
